events.message: The insured reported a collision involving their vehicle on a busy intersection, requesting immediate assistance.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after review of the initial report and key incident details.
An agent was assigned to handle the auto accident claim and to reach out to the insured for further steps.
Acknowledgment of claim filing was sent to the customer with an explanation of the next procedures involved.
Requested photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and insurance documents to proceed with the investigation.
The insured submitted all required documents including the police report and multiple photos of the car damages.
The investigation into the collision circumstances and liability factors was officially started by the claims team.
Investigation completed with findings indicating the other driver was at fault for the car accident.
A settlement proposal was communicated to the insured covering vehicle repairs and medical expense reimbursement.
The insured expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the prompt handling of the claim.
The claim was formally approved following customer's agreement with the settlement terms and conditions.
Payment for the approved settlement was successfully issued to the insuredâ€™s account, confirming closure progress.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after payment confirmation and final documentation completed.
All claim files and records for the auto accident case were archived in the system per company policy.
